description: Home Medkit â€” medicine storage and intake reminders. Home Medkit The application allows you to easily and quickly register and store information about medications taken. Features * Automatically add the medicine by scanning the label (works only for Russian treatments). * The ability to add medications manually. * Update information about the medicine if it was scanned without an internet connection. * Edit information about medicines added manually. * Adding a picture of the medicine. * Sorting of medicines by expiration dates. * Grouping of medicines by categories. * Sound notification of the need for medication. * Display of the nearest medication schedule. * Reminder of the expiration date of medicines. * Export and import the database to other devices. Using the app, you can track the expiration dates of medicines, create a schedule for their intake and receive notifications about it. It is a reliable and convenient assistant that will help you monitor your health.
